mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psets_users(psetID, userID, authority) VALUES (#{psetID}, #{userID}, #{authority});
mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.email, t2.username, t2.registerTime FROM psets_users AS t1 JOIN user AS t2 ON t1.userID = t2.id WHERE t1.psetID = #{psetID} AND t1.authority = #{authority};
